Main.slogan: Ideas and inspiration for those who devote themselves to opera.

JoinUs.title: I want to join the community OperaClass.net
JoinUs.subtitle: The goal of our project is to help young talented opera singers find their way to the stage.
JoinUs.for-pianists-description: If you are a pianist working with opera singers, helping them learn pieces, prepare for competitions, and performing with them on stage - become part of our community by posting your profile on our website.
JoinUs.for-coaches-description: If you are a teacher in vocal, vocal phonetics, solf√®ge, piano, stage movement, acting, or body practices for musicians - become part of our community by posting your profile on our website.
JoinUs.tell-about-us-description: Tell your colleagues about us, share information on social networks. If you need additional information, contact us.

SupportUs.title: support us
SupportUs.description: This is a volunteer project. We need support to grow and expand our geography. Your contribution plays a pivotal role in bridging the gap between professionals and opera educators, creating a harmonious platform where aspiring singers can find their ideal pianist or teacher.

Completed.title: Thank you for your support!
Completed.text: Thanks to your generosity, we are expanding the geography of our project, reaching out to talents and educators across the globe, and fostering connections that transcend borders. By supporting us, you are not only helping individuals find their musical counterparts but also nurturing the growth of the opera community at large. Thank you for being a key part of this exciting journey and for helping to orchestrate a brighter future for opera talents everywhere.
